## EthersRmm.getPosition() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Constructs a [Position](./rmm-ethers.position.md) entity from a Pool entity and by fetching the `account`<!-- -->'s balance of liquidity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPosition(pool: Pool, address: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Position>;
```
